channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Synopsys Finalizes Ansys Acquisition To Enable Leading Simulation Enhanced Design
item.description: After a long 18 months of negotiations and regulatory scrutiny, Synopsys has finalized its approximate $35 billion acquisition of Ansys.

item.title: Seaweed – The Superfood Tackling Health Emissions And Food Security
item.description: Seaweed is fast becoming a climate-smart solution for gut health food security and carbon reduction. Here's how brands are driving global change

item.title: 3 Reasons To Make A ‘Reverse Bucket List,’ By A Psychologist
item.description: We’re always told to keep moving forward. But what if standing still and reflecting is what moves us most? Here are the perks of a reverse bucket list...

item.title: The First Photo Of A Star Is 175 Years Old This Week
item.description: The bright star Vega features in the first-ever photograph of a star in the night sky, taken on July 17, 1850 at the Harvard College Observatory.
